actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating the Prison Ship Martyrs?' Monument in Fort Greene Park, in the New York City borough of Brooklyn, as a unit of the National Park System.

summary.text: Prison Ship Martyrs' Monument Preservation Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating the Prison Ship Martyr's Monument in Fort Greene Park in the New York City borough of Brooklyn as a unit of the National Park System.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating the Prison Ship Martyrs?' Monument in Fort Greene Park, in the New York City borough of Brooklyn, as a unit of the National Park System.
